name: The Painter #2 - Gandok by Meicy Sitorus
description: The vacuumed space and our need to connect, lead to a new perspective of future cities. I occupy, or in a way ‘paint’ the city with words. The city with its existing elements becomes a medium of messages, the act of ‘painting’ is to provoke discussion and help us connect.With all the bombardment of bad news during this pandemic, sometimes using small words of hope or jokes on the situation help us to process our relentless age of anxiety and also works as a reminder. meicysitorus@gmail.com
